<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_801257_ets_trans.EAPStoryAutoCreateUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>EAPStoryAutoCreateUtil</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Utility Script Include for EAP Story Auto-Creation
 * 
 * USAGE:
 *   - isAssignmentGroupEligible(current)  // Check if assignment group is eligible
 *   - createEAPStory(current)             // Create EAP story from current task
 * 
 */
var EAPStoryAutoCreateUtil = Class.create();
EAPStoryAutoCreateUtil.prototype = {

    initialize: function() {
        this.GROUP_BACKLOG_MAPPING_PROPERTY = 'x_thtmi_om_spm.eap.story.auto_create.group_backlog_mapping';
        this.VERBOSITY = gs.getProperty('x_thtmi_om_spm.logging.verbosity', 'false');
    },

    /**
     * Centralized logging function with consistent prefix
     * Only logs if verbosity is enabled via system property
     * @param {String} message - Message to log
     */
    _log: function(message) {
        if (this.VERBOSITY == 'Debug') {
            gs.debug('##Triage: ' + message);
        }
    },

    /**
     * Check if assignment group and optionally catalog item are eligible for EAP story auto-creation
     * Used as business rule condition - checks assignment group and catalog item per group configuration
     * @param {GlideRecord} taskRecord - The current SC Task GlideRecord (from business rule)
     * @returns {Boolean} - True if assignment group (and catalog item if required) is eligible
     */
    isAssignmentGroupEligible: function(taskRecord) {
        if (!taskRecord || !taskRecord.isValidRecord()) {
            this._log('Invalid task record provided - returning false');
            return false;
        }

        var assignmentGroupSysId = taskRecord.assignment_group.toString();
        var catalogItemSysId = taskRecord.cat_item.toString();
        this._log('Checking eligibility for assignment group: ' + assignmentGroupSysId + ', catalog item: ' + catalogItemSysId);

        // Get the group configuration from the mapping
        var groupConfig = this._getGroupConfiguration(assignmentGroupSysId);
        if (!groupConfig) {
            this._log('Assignment group not configured for auto-creation: ' + assignmentGroupSysId);
            return false;
        }

        // Check catalog item requirement if configured for this group
        if (groupConfig.catalog_items && groupConfig.catalog_items.length > 0) {
            this._log('Catalog item filtering required for this assignment group');
            if (!catalogItemSysId) {
                this._log('No catalog item on task, but filtering is required - returning false');
                return false;
            }

            var catalogItemMatch = groupConfig.catalog_items.indexOf(catalogItemSysId) !== -1;
            this._log('Catalog item match result: ' + catalogItemMatch + ' (required items: ' + groupConfig.catalog_items.join(',') + ')');

            if (!catalogItemMatch) {
                return false;
            }
        } else {
            this._log('No catalog item filtering required for this assignment group');
        }

        this._log('Assignment group eligibility check passed');
        return true;
    },


    /**
     * Gets the configuration object for a specific assignment group
     * @param {String} assignmentGroupSysId - Sys ID of the assignment group
     * @returns {Object} - Configuration object with backlog_definition and catalog_items, or null if not found
     */
    _getGroupConfiguration: function(assignmentGroupSysId) {
        this._log('Getting configuration for assignment group: ' + assignmentGroupSysId);

        var mappingJson = gs.getProperty(this.GROUP_BACKLOG_MAPPING_PROPERTY, '');
        if (!mappingJson) {
            this._log('No group-backlog mapping configured in system property: ' + this.GROUP_BACKLOG_MAPPING_PROPERTY);
            return null;
        }

        try {
            var mapping = JSON.parse(mappingJson);
            var groupConfig = mapping[assignmentGroupSysId];

            if (!groupConfig) {
                this._log('No configuration found for assignment group: ' + assignmentGroupSysId);
                return null;
            }
			

            this._log('Configuration for group ' + assignmentGroupSysId + ': backlog=' + groupConfig.backlog_definition +
                ', catalog_items=' + (groupConfig.catalog_items ? groupConfig.catalog_items.join(',') : 'none'));
            return groupConfig;
        } catch (e) {
            this._log('Error parsing group-backlog mapping JSON: ' + e.message);
            return null;
        }
    },

    /**
     * Gets the backlog definition for a specific assignment group
     * @param {String} assignmentGroupSysId - Sys ID of the assignment group
     * @returns {String} - Backlog definition sys_id or empty string if not found
     */
    _getBacklogDefinitionForGroup: function(assignmentGroupSysId) {
        var groupConfig = this._getGroupConfiguration(assignmentGroupSysId);
        return groupConfig ? groupConfig.backlog_definition : '';
    },

    /**
     * Creates EAP Story from SC Task using existing Ajax Processor
     * @param {GlideRecord} taskRecord - The current SC Task GlideRecord (from business rule)
     * @returns {Boolean} - True if story creation was successful
     */
    createEAPStory: function(taskRecord) {
        if (!taskRecord || !taskRecord.isValidRecord()) {
            this._log('Invalid task record provided - cannot create story');
            return false;
        }

        var taskSysId = taskRecord.sys_id.toString();
        this._log('Creating EAP Story for task: ' + taskSysId);

        var assignmentGroupSysId = taskRecord.assignment_group.toString();
        var backlogDefinition = this._getBacklogDefinitionForGroup(assignmentGroupSysId);

        if (!backlogDefinition) {
            this._log('No backlog definition found for assignment group: ' + assignmentGroupSysId);
            return false;
        }

        try {
            this._log('Creating story using proper Ajax Processor pattern');
            this._log('- Task ID: ' + taskSysId);
            this._log('- Backlog Definition: ' + backlogDefinition);

            // Call the Ajax Processor method directly with proper parameters
            var processor = new Agile_Multi_Task_AjaxProcessor();

            // Set up the request object that AbstractAjaxProcessor expects
            processor.request = {
                getParameter: function(name) {
                    var params = {
                        'sysparm_records': taskSysId,
                        'sysparm_table_name': 'sc_task',
                        'sysparm_backlog_definition': backlogDefinition
                    };
                    return params[name];
                }
            };

            this._log('About to call addRecordsToBacklog()...');
            var result = processor.addRecordsToBacklog();
            this._log('Story creation result: ' + result);

            return result === 'true';
        } catch (e) {
            this._log('Error creating EAP story: ' + e.message);
            this._log('Error stack: ' + e.stack);
            return false;
        }
    },


    type: 'EAPStoryAutoCreateUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-09 14:15:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>200d92ec93acfe107181f24efaba100d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EAPStoryAutoCreateUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ETS Transformation" source="x_801257_ets_trans">34ca0c1b938432107181f24efaba101a</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ETS Transformation">34ca0c1b938432107181f24efaba101a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_200d92ec93acfe107181f24efaba100d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-09 14:15:40</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
